name: CLKTextProvider
desc: The common behavior for displaying text-based data in a complication.

items.name: init(format: String, CVarArg...)
items.desc: Creates and returns a text provider built from the specified format string.

items.name: class func localizableTextProvider(withStringsFileTextKey: String) -> Self
items.desc: Creates a localizable simple text provider using the strings file key for the text.

items.name: class func localizableTextProvider(withStringsFileTextKey: String, shortTextKey: String?) -> Self
items.desc: Creates a localizable simple text provider using strings file keys for both the regular text and the shorter fallback text.

items.name: class func localizableTextProvider(withStringsFileFormatKey: String, textProviders: [CLKTextProvider]) -> Self
items.desc: Creates a localizable text provider with a strings file key that resolves to a format string, and with text providers for the replacement arguments.

items.name: var tintColor: UIColor
items.desc: The tint color to use for text.

items.name: var accessibilityLabel: String?
items.desc: A localized string that describes the text.
